name: Libraton PVC Pipe Cutter, Up to 2-1/2", Ratchet Pipe Cutter Heavy-Duty, Pex Cutting Tool for Cutting PEX, PVC, PPR Plastic Hoses and Plumbing Pipe
short_description: 【Heavy Duty & Premium Quality】The Libraton PVC pipe cutter body is made of durable hardness aluminum alloy steel. The thick 3mm blade used is SK5 material with precision sharped and Teflon coated. Sturdy construction and big size suitable for heavy-duty use.

【Widely Application】The Libraton ratchet cutter is designed up to 2-1/2-inch (63mm) outer diameter capacity ideal for use to cut a variety of plastic pipe and tube(PVC,CPVC,PP-R, PEX, PE, Rubber Hose etc.), It is an essential cutting tool for your home handyman, plumbers, electricians, and vehicle mechanics.

【Quick Change】This PVC pipe cutter is unique designed with Quick Change system. You can quick change the blade replacement easily within 10 seconds without any other tools. PLEASE NOTE THAT THE REPLACEMENT BLADE IS NOT INCLUDED. If needed please purchase separately.
【Tips on Cutting Pipes Straight】 Please make sure that the pipe is perpendicular to the blade before cutting, as it helps to ensure cut the pipe straight.

【Tips on Cutting Thin Pipes】 When cutting a thin PVC pipe, please rotate the pipe a little bit after the pipe has been fixed by the V-shape part of the blade, and then do the cutting job. As the thin PVC pipe could be broken if you directly cut it without rotating it.
【Notice】 Please notice that the blade is consumable. The lifetime of the blade can be different in cutting different PVC pipes.

【Efficient Working with Safety】This professional pex cutter equipped with ratcheting drive technology and arch angle design to greatly save your strength when cut pipes. The Spring-loaded ergonomic handle provide a reliable grip and powerful bite force improve work efficiency by fast cutting, faster positioning and single stroke cuts. User can cut pipe within 5 to 20 seconds .There is a safe lock in the bottom of PEX cutting tool. You can buckle it when you don't use the cutter.

【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】Supply a 12month lifetime warranty to this Tube and Pipe Cutter. We have professional product development team to support all your applications to make sure your 100% satisfaction.

name: RIDGID 31803 65S Stainless Steel Tubing Cutter, 1/4-inch to 2-5/8-inch Tube Cutter
short_description: 12 individual bearings replace traditional rollers, creating a smoother cut and allowing for increased speed around the tube
Contoured frame allows for easy alignment while adjusting the cutter to make a cut
Features a specially designed stainless steel cutter wheel that contains bearings in the hub, decreasing drag around the tube for a smoother cut
Large, ergonomic X-CEL knob allows a firm grip so you can cut tubing quickly and easily
Steel tube cutter has a 1/4-inch to 2-5/8-inch (6 mm to 67 mm) cutting capacity
product_description: Designed for optimal performance, the RIDGID 31803 Stainless Steel Tubing Cutter quickly and easily cuts stainless steel tube to the length you need. Featuring an innovative design, the metal tube cutter has 12 individual bearings that replace traditional rollers. These bearings create a smoother cut and allow for increased speed around the tube. Also helping to deliver a smoother cut, the specially designed stainless steel cutter wheel contains bearings in the hub, decreasing drag around the tube. The wheel is precision-machined from high-grade steel and engineered for long life and maximum cutting accuracy. The tubing cutter has a contoured frame allowing easy alignment while making a cut adjustment, and a large, ergonomic X-CEL knob that allows a firmer grip so you can cut tubing quickly and easily. This steel tube cutter has a 1/4-inch to 2-5/8-inch cutting capacity. For use with replacement cutter wheel model E-635 29973. RIDGID covers its products with a lifetime warranty against defects in material or workmanship for the life of the tool. Since 1923, RIDGID has remained the symbol of certainty to dedicated professionals of the expert trades. Every tool that bears the RIDGID brand is engineered to the same high standards of quality, strength and endurance, as was that first heavy-duty pipe wrench more than 80 years ago.

name: Ronan Multi-Cut Industrial Cutter – Heavy-Duty Blade for Plastic, Rubber, Wood, Leather & More – Replaceable Blades, Safety Lock, Ergonomic Grip, 3 Extra Blades Included
short_description: Industrial-Grade Cutting Power – Unlike scissors, the Multi-Cut uses a unique blade-to-anvil action with an offset pivot point for superior cutting power. Easily cuts through thick, dense materials like plastic, vinyl, rubber, wood, leather, and more.

Versatile All-in-One Tool – Originally built for the auto industry, this multi-purpose cutter handles everything from hoses and PEX pipe to craft items and garden branches. Great for contractors, hobbyists, and DIYers alike.

Durable & Replaceable Razor Blades – Features USA-made industrial-grade steel razor blades that last up to 18 months. Includes 3 extra blades stored conveniently in the handle and inch markings for accurate cuts.
Ergonomic & Safe Design – Comfortable ergo-grip handle fits all hand sizes and reduces fatigue. Built-in safety lock keeps the tool securely closed when not in use for added protection.
Built to Last – High-impact plastic anvil protects against wear and ensures clean cuts. Black oxide coating resists rust and corrosion, making this tool tough enough for any environment.
SUPPORTED CUTS: PEX/plastic tubing, rope, leather, soft trim/linoleum, light pruning, wood dowels. NOT FOR: thick metal (coins, nails/bolts), hard PVC, very hard materials.

short_description: [Heavy-duty & Quality] - The PINOZE PVC pipe cutter is made of durable hardness die-cast aluminum and includes a wear-resistant SK5 blade with Teflon coating; The V-blade design allows the tube cutter to penetrate the pipe more easily and more accurately, causing less damage and making a clean cut; Better for heavy-duty use

[Wide Application] - With MAX Opening size of 3" (76mm), it can cut pipes with a maximum outer diameter of 3 inches. The ratchet pipe cutter is ideal for cutting PVC, CPVC, PP-R, PEX, PE, rubber hose and plastic pipe; A must-have cutting tool for home handymen, plumbers, electricians and vehicle mechanics

[Innovative Cutting Stabilizer] - The innovative patented cutting stabilizer can provide better stability when cutting pipes smaller than 2-1/2" in diameter; It can be used depending on the diameter of the pipe that needs to be cut

[Labor-saving Ratchet Mechanism] - Equipped with ratcheting drive technology, this professional PEX cutter greatly provide a powerful bite force to improve work efficiency and save your strength when cut pipes, allowing you to easily cut hard pipe with one hand

[Ergonomic Handle & Safety Lock] - The dual-color handle adopts ABS spraying technology, which is non-slip and comfortable to hold, suitable for long-term work; And the stainless steel handle lock design can help save storage space and prevent accidental injury
[Tips for Cutting Pipes Straight] - Make sure the blade of the tube cutter tool is perpendicular to the pipe before cutting, as this will help to have a clean and perpendicular cut

[Tips for Cutting Thin Pipes] - When cutting thin PVC pipes, rotate the pipe slightly to make a partial depth of circumferential cut after fixing it with the V-shaped portion of the blade, and then make a complete cut; If you cut a thin PVC pipe without rotating it, it may break
